alert.note: Alert for Belmont; Carroll; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 10:14PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT HARRISON...SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...NORTHEASTERN GUERNSEY...SOUTHERN CARROLL...NORTHWESTERN BELMONT AND CENTRAL TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 1014 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Uhrichsville to 6 miles southwest of Freeport. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Philadelphia, Dover, Uhrichsville, St. Clairsville, Barnesville, Cadiz, Carrollton, Freeport, Dennison, Gnadenhutten, Bethesda, Antrim, Tuscarawas, Hopedale, Flushing, Smithfield, Scio, Adena, Midvale, and Jewett. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 188 and 216. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 69 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Belmont; Carroll; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas
